snippet: Shiv Sena founder Balasaheb K. Thackeray, 86, died in Mumbai on Saturday afternoon, doctors who were treating him told reporters.
abstract: Shiv Sena founder Balasaheb K. Thackeray, 86, died in Mumbai on Saturday afternoon, doctors who were treating him told reporters.

headline.main: Bal Thackeray, Extremist Hindu Leader, Dies in Mumbai
